name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior SREngineer with over 10 years of experience in observability, distributed systems, and cloud infrastructure. Proficient in **GitOps**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **AWS**, and experienced in real-time systems and automation tools. Skilled in programming with **Python**, **C**, **C++**, **Java**, **Go**, **Perl**, and **Ruby**. Demonstrated ability to create high-performing APIs and scalable solutions while leveraging observability tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and the **ELK Stack**. Strong communication skills and a history of impactful contributions at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
